mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD (BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, VIEWCNT FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BNO = #{bno}
SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, VIEWCNT FROM TBL_BOARD ORDER BY BNO DESC, REGDATE DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, VIEWCNT FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_BOARD ORDER BY BNO DESC) ) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY BNO DESC, REGDATE DESC
